## Content Update Checklist

- [ ] Updated relevant JSON files in `data/`
- [ ] Added/updated image assets in `public/images/`
- [ ] Added alt-friendly file names (descriptive)
- [ ] Confirmed all URLs are valid and public
- [ ] Confirmed `isPublic: true` consent for profiles
- [ ] Ran `npm run validate:content`
- [ ] Ran `npm run build`
